thread.title: Customers leave racist message at San Antonio restaurant | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Customers leave racist message at San Antonio restaurant | Daily Mail Online

title: Customers leave racist message at San Antonio restaurant | Daily Mail Online
text: 'The food was tasty. However, the owner was Mexican. We will not return': Customers at San Antonio restaurant leave racist message with their receipt Fernando Franco received a racist message at his Italian restaurant on Friday The customers thought the food and service were good but wouldn't come back They said it was because Franco was Mexican and concluded with 'America first' Franco, originally from Mexico City, opened up Di Frabo in San Antonio in 2014 Published: 04:16 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 04:38 GMT, 7 February 2017 160 shares
